items.text: short of length outside off, defended towards short cover
items.shortText: Tiripano to Mohammad Saifuddin, no run

items.text: fuller and wider this time, driven towards deep extra cover
items.shortText: Tiripano to Mohammad Saifuddin, 1 run

items.preText: imTurin: "220 will be a par score...if Bangladesh able to make it, they will win it comfortably..."
items.text: short of length, on the pads, tucked away towards square leg
items.shortText: Tiripano to Imrul Kayes, 1 run

items.text: length ball, just outside off, punched towards cover-point
items.shortText: Tiripano to Mohammad Saifuddin, no run

items.text: fuller outside off, driven this time but once again in the same direction
items.shortText: Tiripano to Mohammad Saifuddin, no run

items.preText: Mursalin Sunny: "We've always heard of Saifuddin as an all-rounder. He has a first class century. A Himalayan of a temperament needed here though."
items.text: length ball, angling across the left-hander who defends it towards point
items.shortText: Tiripano to Mohammad Saifuddin, no run

items.text: slower bouncer, the batsman ducks under it but it bounces just in front of Taylor who fails to gather it but does well to get some part of his body behind
items.shortText: Chatara to Imrul Kayes, 1 bye

items.text: length outside off, left alone
items.shortText: Chatara to Mohammad Saifuddin, no run

items.text: short of length, jumps at the batsman, who does well to keep it down
items.shortText: Chatara to Mohammad Saifuddin, no run

items.preText: Sharat Verma: "I'm feeling for Khan.....I'm sure it's not the Khan's jinx, rather it's sheer coincidence. Khan Cheer it up...BD will win in the end."
items.text: a touch fuller this time, Saifuddin goes for a drive but misses
items.shortText: Chatara to Mohammad Saifuddin, no run

items.text: length ball, comes forward and defends
items.shortText: Chatara to Mohammad Saifuddin, no run

items.text: fuller on stumps, clipped away towards midwicket for a single. 150 comes up for Bangladesh
items.shortText: Chatara to Mohammad Saifuddin, 2 runs

items.preText:
MD. RAKIB HASAN: "This is the real stage to prove himself for Imrul. He should lead the innings towards the end and score big to justify his inclusion. As an allrounder Saifuddin needs to step up and give support to Imrul."

Masum Billah: "ZIM have to restrict BD by 180, anything 180 they will lose the game "
items.text: length ball, around middle, chipped uppishly towards mid-on but well short of the fielder
items.shortText: Tiripano to Imrul Kayes, no run

items.text: short of length and pulled away this time, over midwicket for a boundary
items.shortText: Tiripano to Imrul Kayes, FOUR runs

items.preText: brickhillj: "Yes Khan, it's not your fault. But please reply..." -- Khan, you still there?
items.text: short of length this time, played gently towards square leg, straight towards the fielder, a loud no from Imrul there as he saw Saifuddin charging down
items.shortText: Tiripano to Imrul Kayes, no run

items.text: fuller and wider, driven towards sweeper cover
items.shortText: Tiripano to Imrul Kayes, 1 run

items.preText: tayaruka: "@verma if it was a coincidence let @khan comment again and we will see what happens... As Zim we need you to prove it Khan"
items.text: length ball, just outside off, defended towards point
items.shortText: Tiripano to Mohammad Saifuddin, no run

items.text: fuller and driven past the diving extra cover fielder, sweeper comes around to cut it off
items.postText: And with that I hand it over to Shashank
items.shortText: Tiripano to Mohammad Saifuddin, 2 runs

items.text: goes right back into the crease and bunts this to short third man
items.shortText: Williams to Imrul Kayes, no run

items.text: grip and turn from the rough, beats the inside edge to hit him on the body. Imrul was deep inside the crease as he tried to play that
items.shortText: Williams to Imrul Kayes, no run

items.text: gets to the pitch of the ball and works this down to long-on
items.shortText: Williams to Imrul Kayes, 1 run

items.text: shortens his length, punched to the bowler, who pushes it away as he dives to stop. They scamper a single
items.shortText: Williams to Mohammad Saifuddin, 1 run

items.text: delightfully executed reverse sweep. Gave away his intentions early, but the bowler still drifted this across the left-hander. He was in superb position to power this past short third man. Rolled his wrists nicely to keep this all along the ground.
items.shortText: Williams to Imrul Kayes, FOUR runs

items.text: plays the conventional sweep this time, all along the ground to deep backward square leg.
items.shortText: Williams to Imrul Kayes, 1 run

items.preText: Mavuta is back into the attack
items.text: eased to long-on
items.postText: imTurin: "@Masum Billah: 180 will be little to less considering their batting which consists players like of Williams, ervine, raza and fantastic taylor who somehow always manage to play his A game against Bangladesh."
items.shortText: Mavuta to Imrul Kayes, 1 run
